## 📋 Checklist
<!-- Remove items that don't apply and/or select an item by changing [ ] to [x] -->

- [ ] For new adapters check [submitting your adapter docs](https://docs.prebid.org/dev-docs/bidder-adaptor.html#submitting-your-adapter)
